Description: This Epiphone Les Paul Custom Pro is in excellent condition with nearly no play wear, the frets show a small amount of use. No damage to the body, no dents dings or scratches, no rough corners no static, buzzing or strange noiseS. just a great LP, No case is included. Manufacturers Description: Body shape: Single cutaway Body type: Solid body Body material: Solid wood Top wood: Maple Veneer Body wood: Mahogany Body finish: Gloss Orientation: Right handed Neck Neck shape: SlimTaper D Neck wood: Mahogany Joint: Set-in Scale length: 24.75" Truss rod: Standard Neck finish: Satin Fretboard Material: Rosewood Radius: 12" Fret size: Medium jumbo Number of frets: 22 Inlays: Pearl block Nut width: 1.68" (42.67mm) Pickups Configuration: HH Neck: ProBucker 2 Middle: Not applicable Bridge: ProBucker 3 Brand: Epiphone Active or passive pickups: Passive Series or parallel: Series Piezo: No Active EQ: No Special electronics: Push/pull phase series switch, Push-pull coil splitting Controls Control layout: Volume 1, volume 2, tone 1, tone 2 Pickup switch: 3-way Coil tap or split: Coil split Kill switch: No Hardware Bridge type: Fixed Bridge design: Tune-o-matic Tailpiece: Stopbar Tuning machines: Grover Color: Gold Other Number of strings: 6-string Special features: Pickups Case: Sold separately Accessories: None Country of origin: China Shipping Policy Available for local pickup from Green Bay, WI Ships from Green Bay, WI to: Continental U.S. $35.00 Alaska and Hawaii $50.00 SORRY, no international shipping Usually we charge a flat rate that is lower than actual shipping costs, in the event you live in a far away place shipping may be more. We'll play fair with shipping if you do too! Return Policy Due to the nature of used instruments as a general rule returns are not accepted on eBay sales. However, we at 920 Rocks/Guitar Basement, do understand sometimes a player does not mesh with their new guitar or that issues may arise that would require a return for a satisfied experience. So, we take returns on a item by item basis and chose not to be bound to the sites return policies. As the seller, we have the right to relay conditions of the sale, not a listing website. The buyer will always pay return shipping, and will not be refunded the initial shipping charges. Items that are agreed on to be returned must be returned in original, as-shipped condition with all original packaging and no signs of use. Again, buyer assumes responsibility for all return shipping costs We may ship via USPS, UPS or Fedex. We prefer to not send to PO Boxes however we understand some situations a PO Box is the only option, we will ship to PO Boxes with required signature. We will not deliver to un-manned PO Boxes
